data.text: @canada2021dgopg @CTVNews Tell me you don’t understand health care costs without actually saying it
@CTVNews Why does CTVNEWS only seek comment from the same 3 or 4 doctors / “experts”??  In 2 years a bit of diversity for comment would be welcomed. Diversity is our strength!  Remember?
@CTVNews Fix AHS administration. More funding won’t fix that.

@northsaltonsea @CTVNews No no. I’m talking about an “alt care” faculty for those who drive drunk, just like you are suggesting this would be a good idea for the unvaccinated. Do you think this would be a good idea as well?

@LyleLanley11 @CTVNews Sure… like the penalties that Autopac puts on you when you drive drunk?   Smokers pay more in health insurance…sometimes drunk drivers go to jail…you’re taking this to an all new level man…can’t be as harsh as you…
@IvanB00129041 @CTVNews Not any of the 8,400 people that died waiting for it!
@CTVNews This Dr. Will be sorry when he sees the pfizer data dump. At least we have it on record of his nazi ways.
@joemannix67 @CTVNews without immigration our country shrinks. Who's going to pay taxes to pay for your healthcare?
